desc: LooReady Toilet Seat Covers are toilet seat covers reimagined. They are designed to create a barrier between your bum and contaminated surfaces. LooReady Toilet Seat Covers breakdown and dissolve after flushing. They are individually wrapped in an eco-friendly, biodegradable paper sachet.

layout.text: The World's Most Hygienic Toilet Seat Cover
Stop germs and pee from touching your bum. Large size, won't tear or fall off the toilet. 100% flushable. Individually wrapped.
